name: Don't Trust Me
description:
Made for the first ever Community Game Jam. The theme of the Jam is/was "The game is a liar".

  • Move with WASD.
  • Use the SPACEBAR to interact/read signs.
  • Use your mouse to interact with the menu or shoot.

I have/had more level ideas for the game, but i was running out of time, so the game, althought with an ending, is kinda incomplete.
